metadata.title: CVE-2022-48951 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  ASoC: ops: Check bounds for second channel in snd_soc_put_volsw_sx()  The bounds checks in snd_soc_put_volsw_sx() are only being applied to the first channel, meaning it is possible to write out of bounds values to the second channel in stereo controls. Add appropriate checks.
